TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataItemContainer implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer

summary.span: 启用数据绑定控件容器来为简化的数据绑定操作标识数据项对象。

span.span: Enables data-bound control containers to identify a data item object for simplified data-binding operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口的容器类可以指定其属性为数据绑定操作 (如与类的后期绑定) 标识数据项。Container classes that implement the interface can specify which of their properties identifies the data item for data-binding operations, such as late binding with the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用接口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the interface. 是显示表格格式数据的控件, 类似于或控件。 `SimpleSpreadsheetControl`The `SimpleSpreadsheetControl` is a control that displays tabular-style data, similar to a or control. 它包含一组`SimpleSpreadsheetRow`对象。It contains a set of `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` objects. `SimpleSpreadsheetRow`类是实现接口的容器类。The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class that implements the interface. 虽然在此示例中`Data` , data item 属性以直观命名, 但可以实现属性以映射到方法的任何属性或返回值。Although in this example the data item property is intuitively named `Data`, the property can be implemented to map to any property or return value of a method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`SimpleSpreadsheetControl`和控件在 Access 数据库中显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `SimpleSpreadsheetControl` and control to display data in an Access database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainer1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainer1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataItem As Object
public: property System::Object ^ DataItem { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 实现时，获取在简化的数据绑定操作中所使用的 。

span.span: When implemented, gets an that is used in simplified data-binding operations.

value.span: ，表示执行数据绑定操作时要使用的值。

span.span: An that represents the value to use when data-binding operations are performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识用于数据绑定操作和后期绑定表达式的对象。The property identifies an object that is used in data-binding operations and late-binding expressions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现使用接口的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that uses the interface. 类是一个容器类, 其中包含名为`Data`的成员。 `SimpleSpreadsheetRow`The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class with a member named `Data`. 它通过将 `Data`属性映射到属性来实现接口。It implements the interface by mapping the `Data` property to the property. 简化的数据绑定表达式可以使用属性绑定到数据对象。Simplified data-binding expressions can bind to the data object using the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataItemIndex As Integer
public: property int DataItemIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 实现时，获取绑定到控件的数据项的索引。

span.span: When implemented, gets the index of the data item bound to a control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示数据源中数据项的索引。

span.span: An representing the index of the data item in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现类 (如、 和) 时, 属性用于确定从数据源绑定到控件的数据项的索引。In implementing classes such as , , and , the property is used to determine the index of the data item bound to the control from the data source. 属性不引用数据控件所显示的数据项的索引。The property does not refer to the index of the data item as displayed by the data control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的实现。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the property. 它是类概述主题中更大示例的一部分。It is part of a larger example in the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayIndex As Integer
public: property int DisplayIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 实现时，获取在控件中所显示的数据项的位置。

span.span: When implemented, gets the position of the data item as displayed in a control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示在控件中所显示的数据项的位置。

span.span: An representing the position of the data item as displayed in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现类 (如) 的情况下, 将根据显示的行中的行的索引来设置属性。In implementing classes such as , the property is set according to the index of the row among the displayed rows. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的实现。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the property. 它是类概述主题中更大示例的一部分。It is part of a larger example in the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#5)]
